description: Associates a target account, organizational unit, or the root with a specified configuration. The target can be associated with a configuration policy or self-managed behavior. Only the Security Hub delegated administrator can invoke this operation from the home Region.

parameters.name: ConfigurationPolicyIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a configuration policy, the universally unique identifier (UUID) of a configuration policy, or a value of SELF_MANAGED_SECURITY_HUB for a self-managed configuration.

parameters.name: Target
parameters.description: The identifier of the target account, organizational unit, or the root to associate with the specified configuration. AccountId (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account. OrganizationalUnitId (string) --- The organizational unit ID of the target organizational unit. RootId (string) --- The ID of the organization root.

nested_params.name: AccountId
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account.

nested_params.name: OrganizationalUnitId
nested_params.description: The organizational unit ID of the target organizational unit.

nested_params.name: RootId
nested_params.description: The ID of the organization root.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicyId
nested_items.description: The UUID of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the target account, organizational unit, or the organization root with which the configuration is associated.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the target is an Amazon Web Services account, organizational unit, or the organization root.

nested_items.name: AssociationType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the association between the specified target and the configuration was directly applied by the Security Hub delegated administrator or inherited from a parent.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy association was last updated.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the association between the specified target and the configuration.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatusMessage
nested_items.description: An explanation for a FAILED value for AssociationStatus.
